section.61: Virtues and Merits of the Prophet (pbuh) and his Companions

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:Allah's Messenger (ï·º) said, "The tribe of Quraish, the Ansar, the (people of the tribe of) Julhaina, Muzaina, Aslam, Ashja', and Ghifar are my disciples and have no protectors except Allah and His Apostle
